entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 12:54 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning late in the evening. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
